title: Sleepy Power
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Kanata-san, is this about right~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh, that looks really good! So cute~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Okay! Then, I’ll put this flower on the headband, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Sure, thank you. Sorry, even though you came here to play, you ended up helping me make accessories for my next live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No, I’m the one who said I wanted to do it, so don’t worry about it! Besides, I want to see you wear this headband that I helped make on the live, Kanata-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, Kanata will wear it on next week’s live, so do come, okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah, I’m looking forward to it! Watching your lives always makes me feel like in a dream, it’s so soothing~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufufu, Kanata is aiming to do a live that makes everyone wants to sleep, after all~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Fufu, I’ll have to make sure I don’t doze off until I see you perform with this headband then, Kanata-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Since you’re going to watch my performance, Kanata will make sure to give off even more sleepy power than usual, You-chan~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
